metadata.title: Sergio Monteiro — Front-end Developer
metadata.description: Portfolio of Sergio Monteiro Ribeiro, Front-end developer focused on React, React Native, and user experience.

hero.description: React and React Native specialist, building fast, accessible, and user-centered interfaces.

about.heading: Passionate developer
about.bio1: Front-end Developer with over 4 years of experience, specialized in React and React Native. Working at NewGo Software House since May 2022, building solutions for clients such as USP and Gol/Smiles.
about.bio2: I hold a postgraduate degree in UX Design from PUCRS and a degree in Systems Analysis and Development from UMC. This background allows me to create interfaces that are not only functional, but intuitive and user-centered.

projects.heading: What I have
projects.description: Production projects for real companies, focused on performance, accessibility, and user experience.

inspirar.description: Asthma treatment support app with geospatial air quality monitoring, Google Health Connect integration, and a web system with dashboards for healthcare professionals.

petroCapital.description: Investment management app with real-time push notifications, smooth animations via React Reanimated, and a high-performance interface for iOS and Android.

smiles.description: Web flight search and redemption system for Brazil's largest loyalty program, built with a micro-frontend architecture and high scalability.

skills.heading: Tools of
skills.description: Technologies I work with daily, organized by area.

experience.heading: Professional
experience.description: Experience across consultancy and software house settings, always focused on front-end and user experience.

newgo.description: Front-end development for mid and large-scale clients, building iOS and Android apps with React Native and complex web systems with ReactJS. End-to-end collaboration with design and backend teams, focused on performance, accessibility, and user experience.

cpqi.description: Full stack development in BTG Pactual's Open Finance ecosystem, one of Brazil's largest investment banks. Building React interfaces and REST APIs integrated into the open financial system regulated by the Central Bank of Brazil.
